question: How many passengers over 65 years old flew on international flights in March 2024?
query:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.passenger_id) AS num_passengers
FROM postgres_air.boarding_pass bp
JOIN postgres_air.booking_leg bl ON bp.booking_leg_id = bl.booking_leg_id
JOIN postgres_air.flight f ON bl.flight_id = f.flight_id
JOIN postgres_air.passenger p ON bp.passenger_id = p.passenger_id
JOIN postgres_air.airport ad ON f.departure_airport = ad.airport_code
JOIN postgres_air.airport aa ON f.arrival_airport = aa.airport_code
WHERE p.age > 65
  AND f.scheduled_departure >= '2024-03-01'
  AND f.scheduled_departure < '2024-04-01'
  AND ad.iso_country <> aa.iso_country;
